snippet: After a 10-hour court session, Jason Rezaian, who holds both American and Iranian citizenship, was charged by Iranian officials but he was not told what he was being charged with.
abstract: Washington Post reporter Jazon Rezaian is finally charged by Iranian authorities after being jailed since July, but he is not told what he is being charged with.

byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: After a 10-hour court session, Jason Rezaian, who holds both American and Iranian citizenship, was charged by Iranian officials but he was not told what he was being charged with.

headline.main: Washington Post Reporter, Detained in Iran, Is Charged
headline.print_headline: Washington Post Reporter, Detained in Iran, Is Charged
